categories: Thermo Glacier Mid Arctic Grip Waterproof Boo
description: When cold weather hits, step to it with these toasty winter boots from Merrell. Fleece lined with reflective tech and gel insulation stands up to record-setting wind-chill. Vibram Artic Grip is specifically designed for traction on snow and ice, making slips and slides part of your distant past.Waterfoor leather upper.M-Select DRY waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out while letting your feet breathe.Conductor™ fleece lining adds warmth.Metal hooks for secure lacingProtective rubber toe capBellows tongue keeps debris out1.5mm Primaloft® Aerogel over-the-toe insulation traps heat where you need it, even when compressed.Heat-reflecting insole radiates body heat back toward the foot.Merrell Kinetic Fit™ BASE removable contoured insole for flexible support.Compression molded EVA midsole for stability and comfort.Moulded nylon arch shank.Moulded nylon arch shank adds stability.Vibram Arctic Grip outsole has 5mm lugs for superior traction on slippery winter surfaces.
name: Merrell Thermo Glacier Mid Arctic Grip Waterproof Boots - Men's
